entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , 100 Mile House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:04 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
